content: Has anyone had any success using FML with either V2 or X12? I'm assuming that I'd need to do an interim conversion of X12 to X12 XML so that I could use a Logical Model to take advantage of the transform.

Jean Duteau said:

Has anyone had any success using FML with either V2 or X12? I'm assuming that I'd need to do an interim conversion of X12 to X12 XML so that I could use a Logical Model to take advantage of the transform.

Hi Jean , FML for V2 > FHIR yes. We are using it quite extensively in several projects. Our Mapper comes with a SD Generator for V2.
We have a request for X12 which we are still assessing. Since our clients are mostly in Europe it's the first time we're dealing with X12.
The V2 Stuff will be presented at the FML Connectathon in May. You can reach out to @Daniel DropuljiÄ‡ for more info.
